open-mistral-7b.description: Our very first. A 7B transformer model, fast-deployed and easily customisable. Small, yet very powerful for a variety of use cases. English and code.

open-mixtral-8x7b.description: Currently the best open model. A 7B sparse Mixture-of-Experts (SMoE). Uses 12B active parameters out of 45B total. Fluent in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, and strong in code.

mistral-small-latest.description: Cost-efficient reasoning for low-latency workloads. Fluent in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, and strong in code.

mistral-medium-latest.description: Balanced reasoning for a wide range of tasks. Fluent in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, and strong in code.

mistral-large-latest.description: Top-tier reasoning for high-complexity tasks. Fluent in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, and strong in code.

mistral-embed.description: State-of-the-art semantic for extracting representation of text extracts. English only for now.
